sentences.en: a perilous journey across the mountains
Any advance on Lily's side might have been perilous.
sentences.cn: 倘若丽莉单方面采取主动行动,那将会冒很大风险.

sentences.en: As the storm was approaching, the fisher - men were threatened by dangers of the most perilous nature.
sentences.cn: 风暴正在来临, 所以渔民们受到迫在眉睫的危胁.

sentences.en: He saved it in all kinds of difficult and perilous ways.
sentences.cn: 他尝试着历尽各种艰险救古德森一命.

sentences.en: How did you expect us to proceed on such a perilous expedition, through unknown terrain.
sentences.cn: 你怎么能指望我们如此冒险地穿越未知的地域，继续这一探险？

sentences.en: I asked, " Why do you people live on such a steep and perilous cliff? "
sentences.cn: 我问: “ 你们怎么住在这么个悬崖陡壁的地方? ”

sentences.en: Learning without thought means labour lost ; thought without learning is perilous.
sentences.cn: 学而不思则罔, 思而不学则殆.

sentences.en: Looking ahead in the Internet and intranet worlds is perilous.
sentences.cn: 对因特网和内部网的预测是有风险的.

sentences.en: Our choice in 1972 was to help Iran arm itself or to permit a perilous vacuum.
sentences.cn: 1972年我们面临的抉择是:要么帮助伊朗自己武装起来,要么就得容忍一种危险的真空状态.

sentences.en: The journey through the jungle was perilous.
sentences.cn: 穿过丛林的旅行充满了危险.

sentences.en: The road grew even steeper and more perilous.
sentences.cn: 道路变得越来越陡峭，越来越凶险。

sentences.en: The snow and the blackout combined to make motoring perilous.
sentences.cn: 大雪加上灯火管制使得车辆行驶成了危险的事.

sentences.en: This wealth of evidence is perilous to the Mafia.
sentences.cn: 证据的之多让黑帮处于危险之中.

sentences.en: This, my Lords, is a perilous and tremendous moment.
sentences.cn: 各位议员, 这是个危机四伏的非常时期.

sentences.en: To be puffed by ignorance was not only humiliating, but perilous.
sentences.cn: 无知者的吹捧不仅使人感到可耻, 也是危险的.

sentences.en: You rescued me from a strange and perilous situation.
sentences.cn: 是你把我从奇异的险境中解救出来.

words.tran_cn: 危机四伏地；充满危险地
